name: Keep Him Alive(Post LD Version)
description: You have just realized your life-long dream of becoming a knight. You only wish your father was alive to see you. Soon, rumors arise that he is trapped in a warlock's cave, slowly losing his sanity, unable to escape due to monsters and his increasing weakness from age. You decide to see if the rumors are true, and end up trapped in the cave too. You and your father must escape at all costs. Controls are wasd, click to attack and escape to pause.
